oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thesaurus of Modern Slovene 1.0
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Krek, Simon
Laskowski, Cyprian
Robnik-Šikonja, Marko
Kosem, Iztok
Arhar Holdt, Špela
Gantar, Polona
Čibej, Jaka
Gorjanc, Vojko
Klemenc, Bojan
Dobrovoljc, Kaja
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: thesaurus
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is an automatically created Slovene thesaurus from Slovene data available in a comprehensive English–Slovenian dictionary, a monolingual dictionary, and a corpus. A network analysis on the bilingual dictionary word co-occurrence graph was used, together with additional information from the distributional thesaurus data available as part of the Sketch Engine tool and extracted from the 1.2 billion word Gigafida corpus and the monolingual dictionary.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Centre for Language Resources and Technologies, University of Ljubljana
